name: The Spell(ing) Dungeon
description:
Entry for the Dungeon Crawler Jam 2022.

Had a lot less time this time around, but here's my entry. 

A short dungeon crawler focused around a "typing" mechanic: you defeat enemies, cast spells and chug potions by typing out the words that appear either above enemies or next to the relevant abilities/items.

NUMPAD to move (or click on the arrows on screen)

Click on defeated enemies to loot them, on shops to open them and buy stuff and on levers to open doors. For the rest, type type.

I wish I had more time to refine a lot of things, but perhaps another time. I only had 2-3 days out of the whole week to actually work on this, so I ripped a lot of the assets and movement/AI from my previous entry.

All art is from the unity assetstore, more exactly from Synty Studios and Meshtint. Music as well from John Leonard French, sounds...well...from a lot of places.
